                    <a rel="prev" href="../guides/testing.html" class="nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">
                        <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                    </a>

                    </a>

## path: /guides/reindexing.html

<html lang="en" class="coal" dir="ltr">
    <head>
        <!-- Book generated using mdBook -->
        <meta charset="UTF-8">
        <title>Reindexing - Ordinal Theory Handbook</title>


        <!-- Custom HTML head -->
        
        <meta name="description" content="">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
        <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff">

        <link rel="icon" href="../favicon.svg">
        <link rel="shortcut icon" href="../favicon.png">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../css/variables.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../css/general.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../css/chrome.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../css/print.css" media="print">

        <!-- Fonts -->
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../fonts/fonts.css">

        <!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets -->
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../highlight.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../tomorrow-night.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../ayu-highlight.css">

    </head>
    <body class="sidebar-visible no-js">
    <div id="body-container">
        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "../";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                        <script>
                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");
                          let langList = document.getElementById("language-list");
                          langToggle.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";
                          });
                          let selectedLang = document.getElementById("en");
                          if (selectedLang) {
                              selectedLang.parentNode.classList.add("theme-selected");

                          // The path to the root, taking the current
                          // language into account.
                          let full_path_to_root = "../";
                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "guides/reindexing.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;
                              }
                          }
                        </script>

                <script>
                    document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
                    document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
                    Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
                        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
                    });
                </script>

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="reindexing"><a class="header" href="#reindexing">Reindexing</a></h1>
<p>Sometimes the <code>ord</code> database must be reindexed, which means deleting the
database and restarting the indexing process with either <code>ord index update</code> or
<code>ord server</code>. Reasons to reindex are:</p>
<ol>
<li>A new major release of ord, which changes the database scheme</li>
<li>The database got corrupted somehow</li>
</ol>
<p>The database <code>ord</code> uses is called <a href="https://github.com/cberner/redb">redb</a>,
so we give the index the default file name <code>index.redb</code>. By default we store this
file in different locations depending on your operating system.</p>
<div class="table-wrapper"><table><thead><tr><th>Platform</th><th>Value</th><th>Example</th></tr></thead><tbody>
<tr><td>Linux</td><td><code>$XDG_DATA_HOME</code>/ord or <code>$HOME</code>/.local/share/ord</td><td>/home/alice/.local/share/ord</td></tr>
<tr><td>macOS</td><td><code>$HOME</code>/Library/Application Support/ord</td><td>/Users/Alice/Library/Application Support/ord</td></tr>
<tr><td>Windows</td><td><code>{FOLDERID_RoamingAppData}</code>\ord</td><td>C:\Users\Alice\AppData\Roaming\ord</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
</div>
<p>So to delete the database and reindex on MacOS you would have to run the following
commands in the terminal:</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">rm ~/Library/Application Support/ord/index.redb
ord index update
</code></pre>
<p>You can of course also set the location of the data directory yourself with <code>ord --data-dir &lt;DIR&gt; index update</code> or give it a specific filename and path with <code>ord --index &lt;FILENAME&gt; index update</code>.</p>

                    </main>

                    <nav class="nav-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                        <!-- Mobile navigation buttons -->
                            <a rel="prev" href="../guides/moderation.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                            </a>

                            <a rel="next prefetch" href="../bounties.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters next" title="Next chapter" aria-label="Next chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Right">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i>
                            </a>

                        <div style="clear: both"></div>
                    </nav>
                </div>
            </div>

            <nav class="nav-wide-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">

                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

        <div id="page-wrapper" class="page-wrapper">

            <div class="page">
                                <div id="menu-bar-hover-placeholder"></div>
                <div id="menu-bar" class="menu-bar sticky">
                    <div class="left-buttons">
                        <label id="sidebar-toggle" class="icon-button" for="sidebar-toggle-anchor" title="Toggle Table of Contents" aria-label="Toggle Table of Contents" aria-controls="sidebar">
                            <i class="fa fa-bars"></i>
                        </label>
                        <button id="theme-toggle" class="icon-button" type="button" title="Change theme" aria-label="Change theme" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="theme-list">
                            <i class="fa fa-paint-brush"></i>
                        </button>
                        <ul id="theme-list" class="theme-popup" aria-label="Themes" role="menu">
                            <li role="none"><button role="menuitem" class="theme" id="light">Light</button></li>
                            <li role="none"><button role="menuitem" class="theme" id="rust">Rust</button></li>

                            <i class="fa fa-search"></i>
                        </button>

                    <h1 class="menu-title">Ordinal Theory Handbook</h1>

                    <div class="right-buttons">

                                aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false"
                                aria-controls="language-list">
                            <i class="fa fa-globe"></i>
                        </button>

                        <script>
                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");
                          let langList = document.getElementById("language-list");
                          langToggle.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";
                          });
                          let selectedLang = document.getElementById("en");
                          if (selectedLang) {
                              selectedLang.parentNode.classList.add("theme-selected");
                          }

                          // The path to the root, taking the current
                          // language into account.
                          let full_path_to_root = "../";
                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "guides/sat-hunting.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;
                              }
                          }
                        </script>

                <!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM -->
                <script>
                    document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
                    document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
                    Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
                        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
                    });
                </script>

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="sat-hunting"><a class="header" href="#sat-hunting">Sat Hunting</a></h1>
<p><em>This guide is out of date. Since it was written, the <code>ord</code> binary was changed
to only build the full satoshi index when the <code>--index-sats</code> flag is supplied.
Additionally, <code>ord</code> now has a built-in wallet that wraps a Bitcoin Core wallet.
See <code>ord wallet --help</code>.</em></p>
<p>Ordinal hunting is difficult but rewarding. The feeling of owning a wallet full
of UTXOs, redolent with the scent of rare and exotic sats, is beyond compare.</p>
<p>Ordinals are numbers for satoshis. Every satoshi has an ordinal number and
every ordinal number has a satoshi.</p>
<h2 id="preparation"><a class="header" href="#preparation">Preparation</a></h2>
<p>There are a few things you'll need before you start.</p>
<ol>
<li>
<p>First, you'll need a synced Bitcoin Core node with a transaction index. To
turn on transaction indexing, pass <code>-txindex</code> on the command-line:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoind -txindex
</code></pre>
<p>Or put the following in your <a href="https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/bitcoin-conf.md#configuration-file-path">Bitcoin configuration
file</a>:</p>
<pre><code>txindex=1
</code></pre>
<p>Launch it and wait for it to catch up to the chain tip, at which point the
following command should print out the current block height:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli getblockcount
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Second, you'll need a synced <code>ord</code> index.</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Get a copy of <code>ord</code> from <a href="https://github.com/ordinals/ord/">the repo</a>.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Run <code>RUST_LOG=info ord index</code>. It should connect to your bitcoin core
node and start indexing.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Wait for it to finish indexing.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Third, you'll need a wallet with UTXOs that you want to search.</p>
</li>
</ol>
<h2 id="searching-for-rare-ordinals"><a class="header" href="#searching-for-rare-ordinals">Searching for Rare Ordinals</a></h2>
<h3 id="searching-for-rare-ordinals-in-a-bitcoin-core-wallet"><a class="header" href="#searching-for-rare-ordinals-in-a-bitcoin-core-wallet">Searching for Rare Ordinals in a Bitcoin Core Wallet</a></h3>
<p>The <code>ord wallet</code> command is just a wrapper around Bitcoin Core's RPC API, so
searching for rare ordinals in a Bitcoin Core wallet is Easy. Assuming your
wallet is named <code>foo</code>:</p>
<ol>
<li>
<p>Load your wallet:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli loadwallet foo
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Display any rare ordinals wallet <code>foo</code>'s UTXOs:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">ord --wallet foo --index-sats wallet sats
</code></pre>
</li>
</ol>
<h3 id="searching-for-rare-ordinals-in-a-non-bitcoin-core-wallet"><a class="header" href="#searching-for-rare-ordinals-in-a-non-bitcoin-core-wallet">Searching for Rare Ordinals in a Non-Bitcoin Core Wallet</a></h3>
<p>The <code>ord wallet</code> command is just a wrapper around Bitcoin Core's RPC API, so to
search for rare ordinals in a non-Bitcoin Core wallet, you'll need to import
your wallet's descriptors into Bitcoin Core.</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/descriptors.md">Descriptors</a>
describe the ways that wallets generate private keys and public keys.</p>
<p>You should only import descriptors into Bitcoin Core for your wallet's public
keys, not its private keys.</p>
<p>If your wallet's public key descriptor is compromised, an attacker will be able
to see your wallet's addresses, but your funds will be safe.</p>
<p>If your wallet's private key descriptor is compromised, an attacker can drain
your wallet of funds.</p>
<ol>
<li>
<p>Get the wallet descriptor from the wallet whose UTXOs you want to search for
rare ordinals. It will look something like this:</p>
<pre><code>wpkh([bf1dd55e/84'/0'/0']xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/0/*)#csvefu29
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Create a watch-only wallet named <code>foo-watch-only</code>:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli createwallet foo-watch-only true true
</code></pre>
<p>Feel free to give it a better name than <code>foo-watch-only</code>!</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Load the <code>foo-watch-only</code> wallet:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli loadwallet foo-watch-only
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Import your wallet descriptors into <code>foo-watch-only</code>:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli importdescriptors \
  '[{ &quot;desc&quot;: &quot;wpkh([bf1dd55e/84h/0h/0h]xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/0/*)#tpnxnxax&quot;, &quot;timestamp&quot;:0 }]'
</code></pre>
<p>If you know the Unix timestamp when your wallet first started receive
transactions, you may use it for the value of <code>&quot;timestamp&quot;</code> instead of <code>0</code>.
This will reduce the time it takes for Bitcoin Core to search for your
wallet's UTXOs.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Check that everything worked:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli getwalletinfo
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Display your wallet's rare ordinals:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">ord wallet sats
</code></pre>
</li>
</ol>
<h3 id="searching-for-rare-ordinals-in-a-wallet-that-exports-multi-path-descriptors"><a class="header" href="#searching-for-rare-ordinals-in-a-wallet-that-exports-multi-path-descriptors">Searching for Rare Ordinals in a Wallet that Exports Multi-path Descriptors</a></h3>
<p>Some descriptors describe multiple paths in one descriptor using angle brackets,
e.g., <code>&lt;0;1&gt;</code>. Multi-path descriptors are not yet supported by Bitcoin Core, so
you'll first need to convert them into multiple descriptors, and then import
those multiple descriptors into Bitcoin Core.</p>
<ol>
<li>
<p>First get the multi-path descriptor from your wallet. It will look something
like this:</p>
<pre><code>wpkh([bf1dd55e/84h/0h/0h]xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/&lt;0;1&gt;/*)#fw76ulgt
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Create a descriptor for the receive address path:</p>
<pre><code>wpkh([bf1dd55e/84'/0'/0']xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/0/*)
</code></pre>
<p>And the change address path:</p>
<pre><code>wpkh([bf1dd55e/84'/0'/0']xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/1/*)
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Get and note the checksum for the receive address descriptor, in this case
<code>tpnxnxax</code>:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli getdescriptorinfo \
  'wpkh([bf1dd55e/84h/0h/0h]xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/0/*)'
</code></pre>
<pre><code class="language-json">{
  &quot;descriptor&quot;: &quot;wpkh([bf1dd55e/84'/0'/0']xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/0/*)#csvefu29&quot;,
  &quot;checksum&quot;: &quot;tpnxnxax&quot;,
  &quot;isrange&quot;: true,
  &quot;issolvable&quot;: true,
  &quot;hasprivatekeys&quot;: false
}
</code></pre>
<p>And for the change address descriptor, in this case <code>64k8wnd7</code>:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli getdescriptorinfo \
  'wpkh([bf1dd55e/84h/0h/0h]xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/1/*)'
</code></pre>
<pre><code class="language-json">{
  &quot;descriptor&quot;: &quot;wpkh([bf1dd55e/84'/0'/0']xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/1/*)#fyfc5f6a&quot;,
  &quot;checksum&quot;: &quot;64k8wnd7&quot;,
  &quot;isrange&quot;: true,
  &quot;issolvable&quot;: true,
  &quot;hasprivatekeys&quot;: false
}
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Load the wallet you want to import the descriptors into:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli loadwallet foo-watch-only
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Now import the descriptors, with the correct checksums, into Bitcoin Core.</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli \
 importdescriptors \
 '[
   {
     &quot;desc&quot;: &quot;wpkh([bf1dd55e/84h/0h/0h]xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/0/*)#tpnxnxax&quot;
     &quot;timestamp&quot;:0
   },
   {
     &quot;desc&quot;: &quot;wpkh([bf1dd55e/84h/0h/0h]xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/1/*)#64k8wnd7&quot;,
     &quot;timestamp&quot;:0
   }
 ]'
</code></pre>
<p>If you know the Unix timestamp when your wallet first started receive
transactions, you may use it for the value of the <code>&quot;timestamp&quot;</code> fields
instead of <code>0</code>. This will reduce the time it takes for Bitcoin Core to
search for your wallet's UTXOs.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Check that everything worked:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli getwalletinfo
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Display your wallet's rare ordinals:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">ord wallet sats
</code></pre>
</li>
</ol>
<h3 id="exporting-descriptors"><a class="header" href="#exporting-descriptors">Exporting Descriptors</a></h3>
<h4 id="sparrow-wallet"><a class="header" href="#sparrow-wallet">Sparrow Wallet</a></h4>
<p>Navigate to the <code>Settings</code> tab, then to <code>Script Policy</code>, and press the edit
button to display the descriptor.</p>
<h3 id="transferring-ordinals"><a class="header" href="#transferring-ordinals">Transferring Ordinals</a></h3>
<p>The <code>ord</code> wallet supports transferring specific satoshis. You can also use
<code>bitcoin-cli</code> commands <code>createrawtransaction</code>, <code>signrawtransactionwithwallet</code>,
and <code>sendrawtransaction</code>, how to do so is complex and outside the scope of this
guide.</p>

                    </main>

                    <nav class="nav-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                        <!-- Mobile navigation buttons -->

                            </a>

                            <a rel="next prefetch" href="../guides/teleburning.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters next" title="Next chapter" aria-label="Next chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Right">

                            </a>

                        <div style="clear: both"></div>
                    </nav>

            </nav>

        </div>

        </script>

<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html lang="en" class="coal" dir="ltr">

        <!-- Book generated using mdBook -->
        <meta charset="UTF-8">
        <title>Teleburning - Ordinal Theory Handbook</title>


        <!-- Custom HTML head -->

        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../fonts/fonts.css">

    <body class="sidebar-visible no-js">
    <div id="body-container">
        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "../";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <nav id="sidebar" class="sidebar" aria-label="Table of contents">

        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                        <script>
                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");
                          let langList = document.getElementById("language-list");
                          langToggle.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";

                          // language into account.

                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).

                    document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="teleburning"><a class="header" href="#teleburning">Teleburning</a></h1>
<p>Teleburn addresses can be used to burn assets on other blockchains, leaving
behind in the smoking rubble a sort of forwarding address pointing to an
inscription on Bitcoin.</p>
<p>Teleburning an asset means something like, &quot;I'm out. Find me on Bitcoin.&quot;</p>
<p>Teleburn addresses are derived from inscription IDs. They have no corresponding
private key, so assets sent to a teleburn address are burned. Currently, only
Ethereum teleburn addresses are supported. Pull requests adding teleburn
addresses for other chains are welcome.</p>
<h2 id="ethereum"><a class="header" href="#ethereum">Ethereum</a></h2>
<p>Ethereum teleburn addresses are derived by taking the first 20 bytes of the
SHA-256 hash of the inscription ID, serialized as 36 bytes, with the first 32
bytes containing the transaction ID, and the last four bytes containing
big-endian inscription index, and interpreting it as an Ethereum address.</p>
<h2 id="example"><a class="header" href="#example">Example</a></h2>
<p>The ENS domain name <a href="https://app.ens.domains/rodarmor.eth">rodarmor.eth</a>, was
teleburned to <a href="https://ordinals.com/inscription/6fb976ab49dcec017f1e201e84395983204ae1a7c2abf7ced0a85d692e442799i0">inscription
zero</a>.</p>
<p>Running the inscription ID of inscription zero is
<code>6fb976ab49dcec017f1e201e84395983204ae1a7c2abf7ced0a85d692e442799i0</code>.</p>
<p>Passing <code>6fb976ab49dcec017f1e201e84395983204ae1a7c2abf7ced0a85d692e442799i0</code> to
the teleburn command:</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">$ ord teleburn 6fb976ab49dcec017f1e201e84395983204ae1a7c2abf7ced0a85d692e442799i0
</code></pre>
<p>Returns:</p>
<pre><code class="language-json">{
  &quot;ethereum&quot;: &quot;0xe43A06530BdF8A4e067581f48Fae3b535559dA9e&quot;
}
</code></pre>
<p>Indicating that <code>0xe43A06530BdF8A4e067581f48Fae3b535559dA9e</code> is the Ethereum
teleburn address for inscription zero, which is, indeed, the current owner, on
Ethereum, of <code>rodarmor.eth</code>.</p>

                    </main>

                    <nav class="nav-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                        <!-- Mobile navigation buttons -->
                            <a rel="prev" href="../guides/sat-hunting.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">

                            </a>

                            <a rel="next prefetch" href="../guides/collecting.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters next" title="Next chapter" aria-label="Next chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Right">

                            </a>

        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "../";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

                        <script>
                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");
                          let langList = document.getElementById("language-list");
                          langToggle.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";
                          });
                          let selectedLang = document.getElementById("en");
                          if (selectedLang) {
                              selectedLang.parentNode.classList.add("theme-selected");
                          }

                          // The path to the root, taking the current
                          // language into account.
                          let full_path_to_root = "../";
                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "guides/testing.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;
                              }
                          }
                        </script>

                        </ul>

                <!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM -->
                <script>
                    document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
                    document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
                    Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
                        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
                    });
                </script>

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="testing"><a class="header" href="#testing">Testing</a></h1>
<p>Ord can be tested using the following flags to specify the test network. For more
information on running Bitcoin Core for testing, see <a href="https://developer.bitcoin.org/examples/testing.html">Bitcoin's developer documentation</a>.</p>
<p>Most <code>ord</code> commands in <a href="inscriptions.html">inscriptions</a> and <a href="explorer.html">explorer</a>
can be run with the following network flags:</p>
<div class="table-wrapper"><table><thead><tr><th>Network</th><th>Flag</th></tr></thead><tbody>
<tr><td>Testnet</td><td><code>--testnet</code> or <code>-t</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>Signet</td><td><code>--signet</code> or <code>-s</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>Regtest</td><td><code>--regtest</code> or <code>-r</code></td></tr>
</tbody></table>
</div>
<p>Regtest doesn't require downloading the blockchain or indexing ord.</p>
<h2 id="example"><a class="header" href="#example">Example</a></h2>
<p>Run bitcoind in regtest with:</p>
<pre><code>bitcoind -regtest -txindex
</code></pre>
<p>Create a wallet in regtest with:</p>
<pre><code>ord -r wallet create
</code></pre>
<p>Get a regtest receive address with:</p>
<pre><code>ord -r wallet receive
</code></pre>
<p>Mine 101 blocks (to unlock the coinbase) with:</p>
<pre><code>bitcoin-cli -regtest generatetoaddress 101 &lt;receive address&gt;
</code></pre>
<p>Inscribe in regtest with:</p>
<pre><code>ord -r wallet inscribe --fee-rate 1 --file &lt;file&gt;
</code></pre>
<p>Mine the inscription with:</p>
<pre><code>bitcoin-cli -regtest generatetoaddress 1 &lt;receive address&gt;
</code></pre>
<p>View the inscription in the regtest explorer:</p>
<pre><code>ord -r server
</code></pre>
<h2 id="testing-recursion"><a class="header" href="#testing-recursion">Testing Recursion</a></h2>
<p>When testing out <a href="../inscriptions/recursion.html">recursion</a>, inscribe the
dependencies first (example with <a href="https://p5js.org">p5.js</a>):</p>
<pre><code>ord -r wallet inscribe --fee-rate 1 --file p5.js
</code></pre>
<p>This should return a <code>inscription_id</code> which you can then reference in your
recursive inscription.</p>
<p>ATTENTION: These ids will be different when inscribing on
mainnet or signet, so be sure to change those in your recursive inscription for
each chain.</p>
<p>Then you can inscribe your recursive inscription with:</p>
<pre><code>ord -r wallet inscribe --fee-rate 1 --file recursive-inscription.html
</code></pre>
<p>Finally you will have to mine some blocks and start the server:</p>
<pre><code>bitcoin-cli generatetoaddress 6 &lt;receive address&gt;
ord -r server
</code></pre>

                    </main>

                    <nav class="nav-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                        <!-- Mobile navigation buttons -->
                            <a rel="prev" href="../guides/collecting/sparrow-wallet.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                            </a>

                            <a rel="next prefetch" href="../guides/moderation.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters next" title="Next chapter" aria-label="Next chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Right">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i>
                            </a>

                        <div style="clear: both"></div>
                    </nav>
                </div>
            </div>

            <nav class="nav-wide-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                    <a rel="prev" href="../guides/collecting/sparrow-wallet.html" class="nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">
                        <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                    </a>

                    <a rel="next prefetch" href="../guides/moderation.html" class="nav-chapters next" title="Next chapter" aria-label="Next chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Right">
                        <i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i>
                    </a>
            </nav>

    </body>
</html>

    <div id="body-container">
        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

## path: /hi/404.html  
url: https://github.com/ordinals/ord/blob/gh-pages/hi/404.html  

~~~  
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html lang="hi" class="coal" dir="ltr">
    <head>
        <!-- Book generated using mdBook -->
        <meta charset="UTF-8">
        <title>Page not found - Ordinal Theory Handbook</title>
        <base href="/">


        <!-- Custom HTML head -->
        
        <meta name="description" content="">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
        <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff">

        <link rel="stylesheet" href="fonts/fonts.css">

        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                        <script>
                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");
                          let langList = document.getElementById("language-list");
                          langToggle.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";
                          });
                          let selectedLang = document.getElementById("hi");
                          if (selectedLang) {
                              selectedLang.parentNode.classList.add("theme-selected");
                          }

                          // The path to the root, taking the current
                          // language into account.
                          let full_path_to_root = "../";
                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "404.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;
                              }
                          }
                        </script>

                <!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM -->
                <script>
                    document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
                    document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
                    Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
                        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
                    });
                </script>

                        <script>
                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");
                          let langList = document.getElementById("language-list");
                          langToggle.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";
                          });
                          let selectedLang = document.getElementById("hi");
                          if (selectedLang) {
                              selectedLang.parentNode.classList.add("theme-selected");

                          // The path to the root, taking the current
                          // language into account.
                          let full_path_to_root = "../";
                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "bounties.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;
                              }
                          }
                        </script>

                    <main>
                        <h1 id="ऑरडिनल-करमसूचक-संखयाएं-बाउंटी-हंटिंग-सलाहें"><a class="header" href="#ऑरडिनल-करमसूचक-संखयाएं-बाउंटी-हंटिंग-सलाहें">ऑर्डिनल (क्रमसूचक संख्‍याएं) बाउंटी हंटिंग सलाहें</a></h1>
<ul>
<li>
<p><code>ऑर्ड</code> वॉलेट विशिष्ट सातोशी प्रेषित और प्राप्त कर सकता है। इसके अतिरिक्त, ऑर्डिनल थ्‍यौरी (क्रमसूचक सिद्धांत) बहुत आसान हैं। कोई भी चालाक हैकर ऑर्डिनल थ्‍यौरी (क्रमसूचक सिद्धांत) का उपयोग करके सातोशी में तिकड़में लगाकर स्क्रैच से कोड लिखने में सक्षम होना चाहिए।</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>ऑर्डिनल थ्‍यौरी (क्रमसूचक सिद्धांत) के बारे में विस्‍तृत जानकारी के लिए, अवलोकन के लिए <a href="./faq.html">FAQ</a>, &quot;तकनीकी विवरणों के लिए <a href="https://github.com/ordinals/ord/blob/master/bip.mediawiki">BIP</a>, और <code>ऑर्ड</code> वॉलेट और ब्लॉक एक्सप्लोरर के लिए <a href="https://github.com/ordinals/ord">ord repo</a> देखें।</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>ऑर्डिनल थ्‍यौरी (क्रमसूचक सिद्धांत) मूल रूप से सातोशी द्वारा विकसित किए गये थे। हालाँकि, वह अच्‍छे से जानते थे कि दूसरे लोग इसे अनधिकृत और खतरनाक मानेंगे, इसलिए उसने अपना ज्ञान छुपा दिया था, और यह समय की गर्त में लुप्‍त हो गया था। इस शक्तिशाली सिद्धांत को अब फिर से खोजा जा रहा है। आप दुर्लभ &quot;सातोशी पर शोध करके अपना योगदान और मदद कर सकते हैं।</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं और आपकी यह यात्रा सफल हो!</p>

                    </main>

        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "../";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                <!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM -->
                <script>
                    document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
                    document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
                    Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
                        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
                    });
                </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');

            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                        <h1 id="ऑरडिनल-बाउंटी-1"><a class="header" href="#ऑरडिनल-बाउंटी-1">ऑर्डिनल बाउंटी 1</a></h1>
<h2 id="मानदंड"><a class="header" href="#मानदंड">मानदंड</a></h2>
<p>लेन-देन जो सबसे पुराने सैट वाले यूटीएक्सओ को प्रस्‍तुत किया जाता है उसमें सबसे पुराना सैट है, अर्थात, सभी प्रस्‍तुत किए गये यूटीएक्सओ के बीच सबसे न्‍यूनतम संख्या  को विजेता के रूप में तय किया जाएगा। </p>
<p>बाउंटी ब्लॉक 753984 तक प्रस्‍तुति के लिए उन्‍मुक्‍त है - कठिन समायोजन अवधि 374 का पहला ब्लॉक है। ब्लॉक 753984 या बाद में शामिल प्रस्‍तुति पर विचार नहीं किया जाएगा।</p>
<h2 id="पुरसकार"><a class="header" href="#पुरसकार">पुरस्‍कार</a></h2>
<p>200,000 सैट</p>
<h2 id="परसतुति-का-पता"><a class="header" href="#परसतुति-का-पता">प्रस्‍तुति का पता</a></h2>
<p><a href="https://mempool.space/address/145Z7PFHyVrwiMWwEcUmDgFbmUbQSU9aap"><code>145Z7PFHyVrwiMWwEcUmDgFbmUbQSU9aap</code></a></p>
<h2 id="सथिति"><a class="header" href="#सथिति">स्थिति</a></h2>
<p><a href="https://twitter.com/rodarmor/status/1569883266508853251">@ordinalsindex</a> द्वारा दावा किया गया!</p>

    <div id="body-container">
        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "../";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                        <script>
                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");
                          let langList = document.getElementById("language-list");
                          langToggle.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";
                          });
                          let selectedLang = document.getElementById("hi");
                          if (selectedLang) {
                              selectedLang.parentNode.classList.add("theme-selected");
                          }

                          // The path to the root, taking the current
                          // language into account.
                          let full_path_to_root = "../../";
                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "bounty/2.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;
                              }
                          }
                        </script>

                        <h1 id="ऑरडिनल-बाउंटी-2"><a class="header" href="#ऑरडिनल-बाउंटी-2">ऑर्डिनल बाउंटी 2</a></h1>
<h2 id="मानदंड"><a class="header" href="#मानदंड">मानदंड</a></h2>
<p>प्रस्‍तुति पते पर <span class=uncommon>एक असामान्य</span>सैट प्रेषित करें:✅: <a href="https://ordinals.com/sat/347100000000000">347100000000000</a></p>
<p>❌: <a href="https://ordinals.com/sat/6685000001337">6685000001337</a></p>
<p>पुष्टि करें कि प्रस्‍तुति पते पर आपकी प्रविष्टि प्रस्‍तुत करने से पहले लेनदेन प्राप्त नहीं हुआ है। केवल पहले सफल प्रस्तुतिकरण को ही पुरस्कृत किया जाएगा।</p>
<h2 id="पुरसकार"><a class="header" href="#पुरसकार">पुरस्‍कार</a></h2>
<p>300,000 सैट</p>
<h2 id="परसतुति-का-पता"><a class="header" href="#परसतुति-का-पता">प्रस्‍तुति का पता</a></h2>
<p><a href="https://mempool.space/address/1Hyr94uypwWq5CQffaXHvwUMEyBPp3TUZH"><code>1Hyr94uypwWq5CQffaXHvwUMEyBPp3TUZH</code></a></p>
<h2 id="सथिति"><a class="header" href="#सथिति">स्थिति</a></h2>
<p><a href="https://twitter.com/rodarmor/status/1582424455615172608">@utxoset</a> द्वारा दावा किया गया!</p>

"><a href="../bounty/2.html"><strong aria-hidden="true">8.3.</strong> बांउटी 2: 300,000 सैट्स दावा किया!</a></li><li class="chapter-item expanded "><a href="../bounty/3.html" class="active"><strong aria-hidden="true">8.4.</strong> बांउटी 3: 400,000 सैट्स दावा किया!</a></li></ol></li></ol>
            </div>
            <div id="sidebar-resize-handle" class="sidebar-resize-handle"></div>
        </nav>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");

                          // language into account.

                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "bounty/3.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;

                              }
                          }
                        </script>

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="ऑरडिनल-बाउंटी-3"><a class="header" href="#ऑरडिनल-बाउंटी-3">ऑर्डिनल बाउंटी 3</a></h1>
<h2 id="मानदंड"><a class="header" href="#मानदंड">मानदंड</a></h2>
<p>ऑर्डिनल बाउंटी 3 के दो भाग हैं, ये दोनों ऑर्डिनल (क्रमसूचक) नामों पर आधारित हैं। क्रमसूचक नाम, क्रमसूचक संख्याओं की संशोधित मूल-26 एन्कोडिंग हैं। छोटे नामों को खर्च न किए जा सकने योग्‍य जेनेसिस (उत्‍पति) कॉइनबेस इनाम रोकने के लिए, जैसे-जैसे ऑर्डिनल्स (क्रमसूचक) संख्‍याएं <em>लंबी</em> होती हैं ऑर्डिनल्स (क्रमसूचक) नाम <em>छोटे</em> होते जाते हैं। सैट 0 का नाम, खनन किए जाने वाले पहले सैट का नाम <code>nvtdijuwxlp</code> है और सैट का नाम 2,099,999,997,689,999 है, खनन किए जाने वाले अंतिम सैट <code>a</code> है। </p>
<p>बांउटी, ब्लॉक 840000 तक प्रस्‍तुत करने के लिए उन्‍मुक्‍त है – जो चौथे पड़ाव (खनिकों को मिलने वाले पुरस्कारों &quot;में एक योजनाबद्ध कटौती है। यह शब्द बिटकॉइन के कोड में उल्लिखित है) के बाद वाला पहला ब्लॉक है। ब्लॉक 840000 या इसके बाद के संस्करण में शामिल प्रस्तुतियों पर विचार नहीं किया जाएगा।</p>
<p>दोनों भाग <a href="frequency.tsv">frequency.tsv</a>, का उपयोग करते हैं, ये शब्दों की एक सूची है जो <a href="http://storage.googleapis.com/books/ngrams/books/datasetsv2.html">Google Books Ngram dataset</a> में कितनी बार घटित हुए हैं उसकी संख्या का केवल उन सैटों के नाम शामिल करने के लिए फ़िल्टर किये जाते हैं जिनकी प्रस्‍तुति अवधि के अंत तक खनन किया गया होगा, और जो कॉर्पस में कम से कम 5000 बार दर्शाये गये हैं।</p>
<p><code>frequency.tsv</code> टैब-पृथक करने वाले मानों की एक फ़ाइल है। पहला कॉलम शब्द है, और दूसरा कॉर्पस में कितनी बार दिखाई दिया है। प्रविष्टियों को इस प्रकार से क्रमबद्ध किया जाता है बार-बार न्‍यूनतम से बार अधिकतम &quot;घटित होने वाले क्रम में किया जाता है।</p>
<p><code>frequency.tsv</code> को <a href="https://github.com/casey/onegrams">इस प्रोग्राम</a> &quot;का उपयोग करके संकलित किया गया था।</p>
<p><code>frequency.tsv</code> में नाम के साथ सैट्स के लिए एक <code>ऑर्ड</code> वॉलेट खोजने के लिए, निम्नलिखित <a href="https://github.com/ordinals/ord"><code>ord</code></a> कमांड का उपयोग करें:</p>
<pre><code>ord wallet sats --tsv frequency.tsv
</code></pre>
<p>इस कमांड के लिए सैट इंडेक्स की आवश्यकता होती है, इसलिए जब पहली बार इं‍डेक्‍स का सृजन किया जाता है तो <code>--index-sats</code> को ord में पास किया जाना चाहिए।</p>
<h3 id="भाग-0"><a class="header" href="#भाग-0">भाग 0</a></h3>
<p><em>दुर्लभ सैट्स की जोड़ी दुर्लभ शब्दों के साथ सबसे अच्छी तरह संसर्ग करती है।</em></p>
<p>वह लेन-देन जो UTXO  में सम्मिलित सैट प्रस्तुत करता है, जिसका नाम <code>frequency.tsv</code> में सबसे कम संख्याओं की घटनाओं में दिखाई देता है, वह भाग 0 का विजेता होगा।</p>
<h3 id="भाग-1"><a class="header" href="#भाग-1">भाग 1</a></h3>
<p><em>लोकप्रियता प्रतिष्‍ठा की पहचान है।</em></p>
<p>वह लेन-देन जो UTXO में सम्मिलित सैट प्रस्तुत करता है, जिसका नाम <code>frequency.tsv</code> में सबसे अधिक संख्याओं की घटनाओं में दिखाई देता है, वह भाग 1 का विजेता होगा।</p>
<h3 id="टाई-बरेकिंग"><a class="header" href="#टाई-बरेकिंग">टाई-ब्रेकिंग</a></h3>
<p>टाई के मामले में, जहां दो प्रस्‍तुतियां एक ही आवृत्ति के साथ घटित होती हैं, पहली प्रस्‍तुति विजेता बन जाएगी।</p>
<h2 id="पुरसकार"><a class="header" href="#पुरसकार">पुरस्‍कार</a></h2>
<ul>
<li>भाग 0: 200,000 सैट्स</li>
<li>भाग 1: 200,000 सैट्स</li>
<li>कुल: 400,000 सैट्स</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="परसतुति-का-पता"><a class="header" href="#परसतुति-का-पता">प्रस्‍तुति का पता</a></h2>
<p><a href="https://mempool.space/address/17m5rvMpi78zG8RUpCRd6NWWMJtWmu65kg"><code>17m5rvMpi78zG8RUpCRd6NWWMJtWmu65kg</code></a></p>
<h2 id="सथिति"><a class="header" href="#सथिति">स्थिति</a></h2>
<p>बिना दावे के!</p>

                    </main>

                    <nav class="nav-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">

<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html lang="hi" class="coal" dir="ltr">
    <head>
        <!-- Book generated using mdBook -->
        <meta charset="UTF-8">
        <title>योगदान - Ordinal Theory Handbook</title>


        <!-- Custom HTML head -->
        
        <meta name="description" content="">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
        <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff">

        <link rel="icon" href="favicon.svg">
        <link rel="shortcut icon" href="favicon.png">

        <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/general.css">

        <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/print.css" media="print">

        <!-- Fonts -->
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="fonts/fonts.css">

        <!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets -->
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="highlight.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="tomorrow-night.css">

    <div id="body-container">
        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

aria-hidden="true">7.7.</strong> परीक्षण</a></li><li class="chapter-item expanded "><a href="guides/moderation.html"><strong aria-hidden="true">7.8.</strong> मॉडरेशन</a></li><li class="chapter-item expanded "><a href="guides/reindexing.html"><strong aria-hidden="true">7.9.</strong> रिइंडैक्सिंग</a></li></ol></li><li class="chapter-item expanded "><a href="bounties.html"><strong aria-hidden="true">8.</strong> बांउटीज़</a></li><li><ol class="section"><li class="chapter-item expanded "><a href="bounty/0.html"><strong aria-hidden="true">8.1.</strong> बांउटी 0: 100,000 सैट्स दावा किया!</a></li><li class="chapter-item expanded "><a href="bounty/1.html"><strong aria-hidden="true">8.2.</strong> बांउटी 1: 200,000 सैट्स दावा किया!</a></li><li class="chapter-item expanded "><a href="bounty/2.html"><strong aria-hidden="true">8.3.</strong> बांउटी 2: 300,000 सैट्स दावा किया!</a></li><li class="chapter-item expanded "><a href="bounty/3.html"><strong aria-hidden="true">8.4.</strong> बांउटी 3: 400,000 सैट्स दावा किया!</a></li></ol></li></ol>
            </div>
            <div id="sidebar-resize-handle" class="sidebar-resize-handle"></div>
        </nav>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

        <div id="page-wrapper" class="page-wrapper">
